parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries that are returned.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Marks the current position to start reading. If this field is empty, the data is read from the beginning.

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The field that you use to sort the query results.

Valid values:

*   tableSize

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the query results. Valid value:

*   ASC: in ascending order
*   DESC: in descending order

parameters.name: TableNames
parameters.description: The table names, which are used to filter the query results.
